Battle Fury.name: Battle Fury
Battle Fury.blurb: Tryndamere gains Fury for each attack, critical strike, and killing blow he makes. Fury passively increases his Critical Strike Chance and can be consumed with his Bloodlust spell.
Battle Fury.description: Fury: Tryndamere gains  5 Fury each time he lands a basic attack, and 10 Fury on  critical strikes and each time he kills an enemy. After not dealing or receiving damage for 8 seconds, Tryndamere loses 5 Fury per second.
Battle Fury.description2: Battle Fury: Tryndamere gains 0.35% − 0.5% (based on level) critical strike chance per point of Fury, up to a maximum of 35% − 50% (based on level) critical strike chance.
Battle Fury.notes: * Attacks against structures will not grant bonus Fury, but will still reset the timer on Fury decay.

Bloodlust.name: Bloodlust
Bloodlust.blurb: Tryndamere thrives on the thrills of combat, increasing his Attack Damage as he is more and more wounded. He can cast Bloodlust to consume his Fury and heal himself.
Bloodlust.description: Passive: Tryndamere permanently has bonus attack damage, and gains additional bonus attack damage per  1% of his missing health.
Bloodlust.leveling:
Bonus AD:
5 / 10 / 15 / 20 / 25 AD
Bonus AD Per Missing Health:
0.15 / 0.2 / 0.25 / 0.3 / 0.35 AD
Maximum Bonus AD:
20 / 30 / 40 / 50 / 60 AD
Bloodlust.description2: Active: Tryndamere consumes all of his  Fury and heals himself, increased for every point of Fury consumed.
Bloodlust.notes:
* Bloodlust has no cast time and does not interrupt Tryndamere's previous orders.
 Bloodlust can still be activated if Tryndamere does not have any Fury.

Mocking Shout.name: Mocking Shout
Mocking Shout.blurb: Tryndamere lets out an insulting cry, decreasing surrounding champions' Attack Damage. Enemies with their backs turned to Tryndamere also have their Movement Speed reduced.
Mocking Shout.description: Active: Tryndamere reduces the attack damage of all nearby enemies for 4 seconds.
Mocking Shout.description2: Targets who have their backs turned to him are also  slowed for the duration.
Mocking Shout.notes:
*Mocking Shout cannot be activated unless an enemy is within range of Tryndamere.
 This can be utilized to scout for nearby enemy champions that are not  visible because of Tall Grass or the Fog of War, and provide pseudo stealth detection of enemy champions.

Mocking Shout will provide the enemy with a moment of  sight of Tryndamere if he uses it in the Fog of War.

Spinning Slash.name: Spinning Slash
Spinning Slash.blurb: Tryndamere slices toward a target unit, dealing damage to enemies in his path.
Spinning Slash.description: Active: Tryndamere  dashes to a target location, dealing  physical damage to enemies in his path and gaining  2 Fury per enemy hit.
Spinning Slash.description2: Spinning Slash's  cooldown is reduced by 1 second whenever Tryndamere  critically strikes, increased to 2 seconds against enemy champions.
Spinning Slash.notes: * The cooldown reduction on crit is doubled with a phantom hit from  Guinsoo's Rageblade.

Undying Rage.name: Undying Rage
Undying Rage.blurb: Tryndamere's lust for battle becomes so strong that he is unable to die, no matter how wounded he becomes.
Undying Rage.description: Active: Tryndamere instantly gains  Fury and becomes immune to death for 5 seconds, during which his health cannot fall below a certain amount.
Undying Rage.description2: Undying Rage can be used even when affected by crowd control.
Undying Rage.notes:
*Undying Rage has no cast time and does not interrupt Tryndamere's previous orders.
 Drain-type effects such as life steal and spell vamp are applied before the damage reduction of Undying Rage takes place. As such, these attacks will heal as if the full damage was dealt, despite being unable to bring Tryndamere below 30 / 50 / 70 (based on Undying Rage level) health.
Undying Rage has no effect against the Nexus Obelisk.
